item.title: Investors on edge as Friday’s jobs report could make or break stock-market rally

Europe’s Airbus reports a boost in plane deliveries—despite struggles to regain pre-pandemic production levels
item.description: The figure was higher than the 735 aircraft Airbus delivered in 2023, but less than the 800 planes it had originally hoped to shift in 2024.

item.title: Goldilocks and the AI Revolution: Why mid-sized companies may be ‘just right’ for GenAI adoption
item.description: Mid-sized companies have the agility to reshape their business practices around GenAI—giving them an edge over huge corporations.

item.title: Canada eyes retaliation against U.S. orange juice and steel if Trump imposes tariffs
item.description: Donald Trump said this week he will use economic coercion to pressure Canada to become the nation’s 51st state.

item.title: Trump rattles his EU counterparts ahead of White House return—but here’s why Europe needs to keep Trump close
item.description: The incoming U.S. leader has pledged to end Russia's war in Ukraine, Europeans are also scrambling to avoid trade tariffs that Trump has mooted.

item.title: Beleaguered department store Macy's set to close 66 locations this year
